Methods

🚂 🚀

Class 🎰

🎰 is a pseudo-random number generator. The default implementation relies on the Mersenne Twister algorithm.

Initializers

🆕

🔓 🐈 🆕

Creates a new generator and seeds it with a random value, if possible using hardware entropy.

Methods

🚂

🔓 🐖 🚂 a 🚂 b 🚂 ➡️ 🚂

Generates an integer. Integers are uniformly distributed on the closed interval [a, b].

🚀

🔓 🐖 🚀 ➡️ 🚀

Generates a double, where doubles are uniformly distributed on the interval [0, 1).
